Package org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowPath
  • @Implements(android.graphics.Path.class)
public class ShadowPath
extends Object
    The shadow only supports straight-line paths.
